channel.title: Crowdfunding Collection #182, including every tabletop rpg project started between 10/04 and 10/29
channel.description: I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #182, including every tabletop rpg project started between 10/04 and 10/29. Following a big break, I finally managed to get the collection to a state, in which you can browse the current ttrpg projects. Enjoy. item.title: Crowdfunding Collection #182, including every tabletop rpg project started between 10/04 and 10/29
item.dc:creator: @Teylen
item.description:
@Teylen wrote:

I present to you the new Crowdfunding Collection #182, including every tabletop rpg project started between 10/04 and 10/29.

Following a big break, I finally managed to get the collection to a state, in which you can browse the current ttrpg projects. Enjoy.

English Crowdfundings

6 Roleplaying Games
3 D&D based Roleplaying Games
7 Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 Turn of the Century Roleplaying Games
4 Urban Fantasy Roleplaying Games
2 GM-less Roleplaying Game
1 Solo Roleplaying Sourcebook
1 Larp & Erg채nzungsband
1 Hybrid Roleplaying Game
1 Gamebook
5 Magazines
4 Settings
10 D&D 5E Settings
7 Sourcebooks
10 D&D 5E Sourcebooks
2 D&D 5E Sourcebooks with Minis
7 Adventures
6 D&D 5E Adventures
2 D&D 5E / PFRPG Adventures
1 OSR Adventure
12 Dice Projects
4 D20 Dice Projects
2 D6 Dice Projects
3 Dice Towers
2 Accessoires
5 Deck of Cards
4 Deck of Cards
2 Tarot Cards
1 Journal
1 Actual Play
1 M체nz Projekt
2 Enamel Pins
3 Various RPG Projects
1 Another

German Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game
1 Comic

Spanisch Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game
1 Novel

French Crowdfundings

1 Roleplaying Game
3 Adventures
1 Accessoire

20 Ended Projects

Article: https://teylen.blog/2021/10/29/crowdfunding-collection-182/
